title: Added year display to the record column on tables
description: To assist in interpretting the recorded payout column on tables, I've added a year value, which translates the number of records in to years.

title: Added stock type filters to search table
description: Database queries are now filterable by stock type. Use the multi-select in the filters section on the homepage to apply the new feature.

title: Added stock type to DB and stock pages
description: Added a stock type field to the db, which indicates whether a stock is an ETF, ETS, Common stock, and more. This value has been added to the individual stock pages for now. A filter will be added to search for specific stock types soon.

title: Added announcements
description: Added an announcements pane to notify users of new features and changes.

title: Full stock titles
description: Added expanded (full) stock titles to tables
